item.title: The Iron Lion
item.description: About the Book Persian-style fairy story about how the poorest prince in the world persuaded the Iron Lion of Ferdustan to help him win the hand of the Princess of Persia. Originally illustrated by Marc Brown, later by Pauline Baynes.
